ComfyUI-TGu-utils.question: Who is the author of the TGu Utilities custom nodes for ComfyUI?
What is the primary focus of the TGu Utilities custom nodes for ComfyUI?
What does the LoRA Switch node control in ComfyUI?
ComfyUI-TGu-utils.answer: It controls whether a LoRA Loader and its corresponding trigger prompts will be included in the queue.

ComfyUI-TGu-utils.question: What are the inputs for the LoRA Switch node?
What are the outputs for the LoRA Switch node?
What does the MODEL output of the LoRA Switch node provide when the switch is OFF?
What does the MODEL output of the LoRA Switch node provide when the switch is ON?
What does the CONDITIONING output of the LoRA Switch node provide when the switch is OFF?
What does the CONDITIONING output of the LoRA Switch node provide when the switch is ON?
